body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting TravelTime. My name is Austin Long. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Pamela. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I recently stayed at one of your hotels and was surprised by the staff's unfriendliness.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm truly sorry to hear that, Pamela. Is there a specific incident you would like to share with us?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, during check-in, the front desk staff was unhelpful and seemed indifferent to my needs.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing your feedback, Pamela. Could you also provide me with your booking reference number and the name of the hotel you stayed at?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My booking reference number is four five six seven eight, and I stayed at the Oceanview Hotel.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Pamela. We will investigate the matter and take appropriate actions. Your experience is important to us.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for contacting TravelTime. Have a great day, Pamela.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your assistance. Goodbye.
